reviews.name: Matt Lidinsky
reviews.text: There is no better plumbing company in Howard County as far as I am concerned. I have used Ehrhardt several times over the years and always found them to be skilled and reasonable. My most recent experience, however, was second to none. On Saturday, we noticed the smell of gas in our home and called BGE to respond. BGE confirmed the leak and shut off gas service to the entire house. I called Ehrhardt at the open of regular business on Monday with the prospect of a family of 5 set to arrive later in the day for a weeklong visit being greeted with cold showers and no homecooked meals as both the hot water and stove are on gas. Although Ehrhardt was booked solid until later in the week under regular scheduling, the owner himself understood the situation and personally came to my home with another technician to check the lines and fix the leak with hours to spare. I recommend Ehrhardt without hesitation since they provide all of the services of the "bigger companies" without losing the small business customer service.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Matt, Thank you!  We are so glad we could help you!  We truly appreciate your business.  We love our customers!

reviews.name: T B
reviews.text:
It's the reviews that are often not posted which customers should be concerned about. For this reason we decided to post without specifics, but out of concern for the community we can't /won't recommend this entity as a professional business.

*Updated 6/8 - This is not spam and shouldn't have been reported as such. It's a very honest review.

reviews.name: Bill Meyler
reviews.text: Just had a great experience getting a new hot water heater installed from Ehrhardt Brothers. Tracy went the extra mile to quickly locate a special order unit, the crew was great, and the price was exactly half the amount of the other estimate we had. Honest, professional. Outstanding.

reviews.name: Jacqueline S
reviews.text:
Called Ehrhardt Brother's here in Columbia because purchased a New LG washer & Dryer and the guys who delivered it couldn't hookup the washing machine because of corrosion on the old hookup.
Vince came out and took care of everything  & fast! This is the 2nd time I've called Ehrhardt over the years and I won't ever call anybody else! Both times Vince came out
and is so knowledgeable and professional and gets the job done!
He is such a gentleman and I know his parents are very proud of him!:)
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Jacqueline thank you for this wonderful review.  We are very pleased to hear all of this and yes we are very fortunate to have a wonderful team of technicians.  We appreciate your business!

reviews.name: Ching Tee
reviews.text: Called Ehrhardt Brothers Plumbing to replace a washer drip pan. I got their name from my HOA recommended plumbing company. The process of scheduling an appointment was easy and quick. I was fortunate that they were able to send a professional out within 2 hours. Rob showed up on time, get to work immediately. Although it was a challenge for a one person but he did not give up. We worked together to move out the stacked washer and dryer, and he improvised a solution. He was professional, respectfu, knowledgeable, and completed the work as requested promptly. The invoice given was reasonable for the work. Thank you Rob and Ehrhardt Brothers Plumbing.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Ching for these wonderful reviews.  We appreciate your business and time in reviewing us.

reviews.name: Jigar Sitapara
reviews.text: Vince was incredible and I will be contacting him for any of my future plumbing needs. Was able to quickly and efficiently locate a leak, fix it, and address other plumbing issues we were having. He was friendly, very respectful of keeping our home clean, and was very knowledgeable. Already referred him to family who need plumbing work done. 10/10.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much Jigar.  Vince is great and we are glad to have him.  We appreciate your business!

reviews.name: Mike Butterfield
reviews.text: I wanted the anode on my hot water heater replaced.  One plumber  (Greenfox) said they do not replace anodes or do hot water heater maintence. Another, Ben Franklin, wanted $99 just to come out to give an estimate.  Ehrhardt Brothers just asked me for a couple photos on email and provided a qoute, which was reasonbly priced. Install was done well and I am happy with the work.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much!  We appreciate your business!

reviews.name: Anna Brekken
reviews.text: Plumber showed up on time and was pleasant, but he spent about 20 minutes in his truck before coming to the door. I found out later that they will charge you for their visit by time. He spent almost 30 minutes in my house checking on things, so they charged me $190 for the "hour" they were at my place, even though less than 30 minutes were actually in my house. I don't know what he was doing in his truck for 20 minutes but it doesn't seem fair that I should pay for that time. I also found out that they will not count the $190 towards any work done. So, I paid almost $200 for a 30 minute visit and no work. I had another plumber come who didn't charge me for the visit at all.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Anna.  When you called we explained our rates of time and materials as well as our minimum charges for coming out.  We come out to diagnose and our intent is to fix at the same time when it's possible.  Therefore, we charge according to our time there.  The time spent in the truck when he arrived as we had discussed with you in person was not typical as he was stuck on the phone reviewing the previous job.  It was unexpected that he was stuck on the phone prior to coming in and for that we assure you no charges were incurred against your project.  We do thank you for your time.
